mapper.insert:
insert into AUDITOR_OFFICIAL_TAX ( DOCUMENT_CARRIER_IATA_NO, DOCUMENT_NO, DOCUMENT_TYPE, ISSUE_DATE, TAX_CODE, TAX_ALREADY_PAID_FLAG, TAX_AMOUNT, TAX_CURRENCY, TAX_SEQ_NBR )
SELECT #{item.documentCarrierIataNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.documentNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.documentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_date(#{item.issueDate, jdbcType=DATE}, 'yyyyMMdd'), #{item.taxCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxAlreadyPaidFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.taxCurrency, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxSeqNbr, jdbcType=DECIMAL} FROM DUAL
